data.title: bd-2qa: fix inbox --all-workspaces false orphan detection
data.description: Fixes inbox --all-workspaces falsely classifying cross-workspace events as orphaned. Merges all events from all workspaces into an in-memory projection before querying inbox.

data.reason:
Security review complete. No security issues found.

**Checked:**
- SQL injection: All operations use parameterized queries (params![]) — safe
- Duplicate event handling: All event handlers use INSERT OR IGNORE or ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE — safe against duplicate events from merged workspaces
- Path traversal: validate_review_id() validates review IDs; workspace paths from trusted jj source
- Memory safety: In-memory DB is scoped to function call, no persistent state leaks
- Error handling: Silent error swallowing in workspace reads matches prior pattern, not exploitable
- Transaction safety: unchecked_transaction on single-threaded in-memory DB is correct

**Notes (non-blocking):**
- sync_from_review_logs_with_known() is pub but unused — consider removing dead code
- Good test coverage with 4 new cross-workspace scenarios
